title: The host is resolvable by running a container under this custom network
content:
‚ùØ docker run --rm --net demo alpine nslookup connectivity-check.warp-svc.
Server:         127.0.0.11
Address:        127.0.0.11:53Non-authoritative answer:
Name:   connectivity-check.warp-svc
Address: ::ffff:127.0.2.2
Name:   connectivity-check.warp-svc
Address: ::ffff:127.0.2.3Non-authoritative answer:
Name:   connectivity-check.warp-svc
Address: 127.0.2.2
Name:   connectivity-check.warp-svc
Address: 127.0.2.3
